comment.author: 52682399@N07
comment._content:
Probably from a Timme Rosenkrantz jam session.
When Timme  started his jam sessions Pied Piper had changed its name to Little Bohemia (or Café Bohemia).
(T. Rosenkrantz, Dus med Jazzen, 1964, 138-39).
("Village Gets Jam Sessions," Down Beat, August 13, 1947: 2).
